1.For great men, religion is a way of making friends, small people make religion a fighting tool.
2.If you fail, never give up because FAIL means, First Attempt In Learning.
3.If you want to shine like a sun. First burn like a sun.
4.Dream is not that which you see while sleeping it is something that does not let you sleep.
5.Man needs difficulties in life because they are necessary to enjoy the success.
6.Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
7.Without your involvement you can not succeed. With your involvement you can not fail.
